body_html:
Did you set all the environment variables listed here:
https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/windows.html#requirements

Namely, you will need to set the following environment variables for bazel to work correctly on your system.

BAZEL_SH
JAVA_HOME
BAZEL_PYTHON
BAZEL_VS

BAZEL_VS
body:
Did you set all the environment variables listed here:
https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/windows.html#requirements

Namely, you will need to set the following environment variables for bazel to work correctly on your system.
```
BAZEL_SH
JAVA_HOME
BAZEL_PYTHON
BAZEL_VS
```
